name: Super Snoot Boi
description:
Take control of Snoot, a peculiar yellow creature with a special hatred for grapes. 

Take your pick of six different game modes:

  • Normal. Standard gameplay.
  • Doubles. Shoot grapes with the correct color bullet to destroy them.
  • Retro. A retro re-skin of Normal mode.
  • Laser. Dodge both grapes and lasers.
  • Jungle. Protect the Tiki in the center of the room.
  • Evil. Dodge the indestructible ghost grapes.

How to play:

Move Snoot with WASD or the arrow keys. Shoot with the left mouse button or the space bar. Aim with the mouse. Shoot the grapes to earn points. The more points you have the higher the phase. The higher the phase, the harder the game will become. Touch power ups to gain a special power. Power ups are temporary, so take advantage of them when you have them. Avoid hazards. Shoot them to destroy them. Their effects can range from mild inconveniences, to an instant game over. Complete a game mode to unlock a new skin.

Credits:
Made with GameMaker: Studio 1.4
Sounds made with sfxr
Music made with Bosca Ceoil
